tasks.task: Harvesting and prep of garden produce for breakfast.
subtasks: Finding and identifying garden produce.
Checking for pest damage (slug bites).
Gathering various items for stir fry: squash, beans, basil, chives.
Preparing a stir fry starter.
Locating the farm site (Jackers Herb Farm in Gloucestershire).
Touring the farm during an open day.
Observing the facilities and perhaps interacting with the farmer.

tasks.task: Managing a worm bin for kitchen waste composting.
subtasks: Checking the worm bin's content and activity.
Adding kitchen waste.
Assessing plant needs for winter survival.
Adjusting pot sizes and soil compositions.
Repotting and root pruning.
Sheltering plants from root rot with proper drainage.

tasks.task: Planned repotting and care for various herbs and plants.
subtasks: Ensuring proper pot sizes for each plant.
Addressing each plant's specific needs (e.g., coriander, oregano, etc.).
Securing plants for winter with central heating.

tasks.task: General aftercare for garden and indoor plants.
subtasks: Inspecting plants for any pests or issues.
Addressing any identified issues to prevent further damage.
Continuing to tend to the garden through the fall.
Preparing for potential winter garden maintenance.
